meanings.definition: To bring to an end or conclusion.
meanings.sent1: I will piend the story with a happy ending.

meanings.sent3: After a long day, they finally piended their journey with a warm meal.

meanings.definition: To enclose or surround with a fence or wall.
meanings.sent1: The farmer will piend the sheep in the pen for the night.
meanings.sent2: They plan to piend the garden to keep out the rabbits.
